channel.title: My pure. (Combat 44)
channel.description: I made this account like six months ago but then got tired of playing but now I play on it when I'm bored. Combat lvl is 44 atm. [b]Goals[/b] 90 Str = Should take a few weeks if I pc. 65 Att = Getting this also with pc. 90 Range = Pc also... 85 Mage = Alching and using mud battlestaff for curses etc. This should take me about... 3 months if I don't play every day, but if every day then like 1-2 months. ============================================================================ Here's the bank [img]http://img91.imageshack.us/img91/7656/f2ppurezx3.jpg[/img] and here are the stats [img]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/2976/statslr5.jpg[/img] Sorry, the pics are large even I resized and cut everything.

item.title: My pure. (Combat 44)
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:4, topic:94937”]you have no life lol if you can get 90 str in 3 months you have no life[/quote]I lol’d, yes I do have a life. You can get 99 str in 1 month if you play 2 hours every day just by going to pest control. You can get 100 points in 2 hours, meaning 90k xp per 2 hrs. Every day 90k xp for a low lvl is really good. 30x90k= 27m xp and a skill of 99 needs 13m something xp so I can get 99 str even in 15 days.

Read full topic

@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

I made this account like six months ago but then got tired of playing but now I play on it when I’m bored.
Combat lvl is 44 atm.
Goals
90 Str = Should take a few weeks if I pc.
65 Att = Getting this also with pc.
90 Range = Pc also…
85 Mage = Alching and using mud battlestaff for curses etc.
This should take me about… 3 months if I don’t play every day, but if every day then like 1-2 months.

Here’s the bank and here are the stats
